title: (x) McNeal's - Bureau Eagle {Mike Y}
content:
This is the cleanest version of their logo one of our customers could provide us with. I've been using it for about 6 months now and I can't stand it any more. I'm going to recreate free of charge just so I don't have to look this peice of garbage. The font is similar to Futura or Century Gothic, but the mid-point of the M doesn't touch the baseline. Anyone recognize it?   
   
Thanks in advance for sharing your knowledge.   
   
 ![McNeals' really crappy logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125727im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47917.jpg)
author: jdaghir

comments.content: Bureau Eagle that has been slanted

See [Eagle](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125727/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/eagle/?PREFS_SET%5BRenderSize%5D=36&PREFS_SET%5BRenderString%5D=McNeal) from Font Bureau without the slant.
